content.detailedDescription:
On the night of october 18, 2014, i arrived home around 11:30/12midnight. when i got out of the car, i looked up, as usual, to stargaze. it was a clear night and so i looked up in the back lot of my house because i have a big, wide open view of the sky. as i looked at stars i recognized, i noticed a group of stars in the sw direction of my sky. there were maybe 6 or 8 i'm guessing. they were more faint than the other stars and their mutual color was slightly off compared to the other stars/planets in the sky. they seemed a little fainter than the rest and their color was maybe a little gold-ish. they also seemed like they were a lot higher up than the rest. at first i assumed that they were so high up that maybe they were behind a really high up faint cloud so they were blurred and faint. they didn't "twinkle" like a star. i ruled out a plane or helicopter right away. then i thought satellite, blimp, weather balloon, but i'm not sure what they are supposed to look like so still wasn't sure. i also didn't see any indication that would convince me it was any of those, however. this all happened in matter of seconds, by the way. what made me drop my jaw was that i noticed that they were in a cluster, individually, independently moving (like maybe spinning or circling) within their cluster, and at the same time, simultaneously moving as a group across the sky heading east. they remained basically as high as when 1st sighted. it doesn't make sense to me. i ran to get my binoculars but they disappeared from my sight line, behind the neighborhood houses i guess, never to be seen again. so i immediately facebook posted my sighting and googled it but got no satisfying answers. i wrote to nasa and 2 months later i got a generic answer and it just directed me to their links. no explanation. someone told me about your site so here i am. i'm just looking for a possible explanation to ease my crazy-curious mind. i'm open minded and would like to know every possibility. i felt like i was just seeing something "cool" that had a perfect explanation. then i thought it was "out of this world" and my heart dropped in shock, i calmed down to concentrate on what i believe i was witnessing, a possible ufo. afterwards i was disappointed that i lost sight. then i got excited to spread my news. i did not experience any common "encounter" feelings or physical changes that are commonly reported on closer contacts. just my human emotions! i am a believer of ufo and et's and etc. but i'm also realistic about misconceptions. i hope someone can explain this phenomenon. 

thank you
content.summary: Suspicious star-like cluster seen high in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I and four friends were on a two-day current river float trip and had stopped at a primitive site to camp.  it was a clear, chilly evening and we had a big fire going.  the fire got smoky so the other 4 guys moved on the side of the fire with their backs toward the river.  i stayed on the smoke side to stir the fire and get more flame. then i moved away from fire and perhaps 10 yards away from and adjacent to my friends in order to get a clear view of the sky overhead.  there was no moon and the sky was thick with stars.  

i detected the movement of what i initially thought was a satellite.  within 3 seconds of spotting it, i noted that it was descending at about a 60 degree angle and i thought "shooting star."  after about 10 seconds of watching, it became brighter, began to transform from star-white to a luminous green, and seemed to be in a straight line descent headed for our general area.  10 seconds later, it seemed apparent that what i now thought was a meteorite was going to strike the earth a short ways down stream and perhaps a half mile into the hilly forested area on the other side of the river.  as i watched it passed by, there was no sound and the entire area was lit up in an intense green glow for about 2 seconds.  if a baby aspirin was held at arms length, the object took up about that much of my visual field. it headed for the tree tops and i thought to myself, "this thing is really going to hit!" 

just as the object reached the distant tree tops, it stopped for an instant, made an abrupt angular turn avoiding the trees and sped off just above tree level into the distance and was gone is perhaps a second. i jumped a foot off the ground exclaiming, "did you *@#@ing see that!?" the guys turned their gaze from the fire and toward me and asked, "see what?" i described what had happened and no one had seen the object.  except, the fellow who was sitting in front of the fire and the closest to me had seen the brilliant green glow in  his peripheral vision. (i'm counting him as a weak witness.)
content.summary: Watching night sky i saw satellite-like movement, but within seconds of siting it, it began to decend from the 1 o-clock position to the 7:30.

content.detailedDescription:
I and four friends were on a two-day current river float trip and had stopped at a primitive site to camp.  it was a clear, chilly evening and we had a big fire going.  the fire got smoky so the other 4 guys moved on the side of the fire with their backs toward the river.  i stayed on the smoke side to stir the fire and get more flame. then i moved away from fire and perhaps 10 yards away from and adjacent to my friends in order to get a clear view of the sky overhead.  there was no moon and the sky was thick with stars.  

i detected the movement of what i initially thought was a satellite.  within 3 seconds of spotting it, i noted that it was descending at about a 60 degree angle and i thought "shooting star."  after about 10 seconds of watching, it became brighter, began to transform from star-white to a luminous green, and seemed to be in a straight line descent headed for our general area.  10 seconds later, it seemed apparent that what i now thought was a meteorite was going to strike the earth a short ways down stream and perhaps a half mile into the hilly forested area on the other side of the river.  as i watched it passed by, there was no sound and the entire area was lit up in an intense green glow for about 2 seconds.  if a baby aspirin was held at arms length, the object took up about that much of my visual field. it headed for the tree tops and i thought to myself, "this thing is really going to hit!" 

just as the object reached the distant tree tops, it stopped for an instant, made an abrupt angular turn avoiding the trees and sped off just above tree level into the distance and was gone is perhaps a second. i jumped a foot off the ground exclaiming, "did you *@#@ing see that!?" the guys turned their gaze from the fire and toward me and asked, "see what?" i described what had happened and no one had seen the object.  except, the fellow who was sitting in front of the fire and the closest to me had seen the brilliant green glow in  his peripheral vision. (i'm counting him as a weak witness.)
content.summary: Watching night sky i saw satellite-like movement, but within seconds of siting it, it began to decend from the 1 o-clock position to the 7:30.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at  the beach comber parking  lot  in welfleet at 1:00-1:30 am. designated driver i was as sober as a rock.I noticed a craft in the sky over the ocean that was so big you would have to be blind to miss it . first thing i thought was ufo i have never seen a craft that could match the size and magnitude of the object. it was not concerned about making its presence discreet . the craft appeared to be rectangular from the point of view i witnessed from . it had about 8-10 bright rectangular lights emitting an extremely powerful white colored spectrum of light . it was miles out to sea and i would estimate it at 3000ft or less in altitude from sea level . it was hovering looking out toward ocean (east ) the lights would flash in a distinct pattern skipping one in a direction from left to right . appears as if there were other colors like blue and red and gold around the perimeter of rectangular white lights during sequence . there was a light mist in the air that the reflection of the light was capturing causing it to illuminate the area around it slightly . within minutes sky clears up. while hovering the was another object very close that was much smaller ( gold orange orb) moving slowly around the object sometimes changing directions . smaller object was pulsating sometimes getting very bright. after 15 min of being stationary the object started moving close to shore at a consistent super smooth rate . headed north and north west . no sound could be heard . i'd say it got to within a mile off shore . looks as if smaller object attached or entered larger object during the move. it was no longer visable. i was very exited at first but at the same time .. i've seen ufos on other occasions .Lbit nothing has ever compared to the magnitude and visibility of this expired. intrigued but cautious it made me feel uneasy . it felt as if it was going to be something out of war of the world or independence day . i tried to take some picture . came out blurry from my vantage point . i quickly alerted the people i was with and they witnessed along with at least 30-40 other people . somebody has footage or a picture i am sure of it. mind blown . the girls i was with were getting agitated because we had not left yet . after about 30 min of observation i had left although i did not want to miss a second. i uploaded pics . poor photo quality .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked like mothership with smaller glowing craft flying around it in close proximity. main craft gigantic .About 10-12 bright white lights on front .

content.detailedDescription:
Was going to work, stopped for coffee. looked up, saw bright yellow, long cylinder, clearly filled the sky. very strange. never saw anything like before or after. big object, was still. 

was busy, going to work. got in my car, and left. 

feelings, of knowing it was something peculiar, and knowing the area. things have always been seen to be strange in the bay area. more so in silicon valley.
content.summary: Long cylinder across sky, aiming at a right angle, blunt cut off at end with rings in it. huge formation.

content.detailedDescription: I was the legal svcs chief at mcagcc, 29 palms and just left the marines.  i was a at local park late at night with a friend.  we were laying down in the back of my suv when i noticed an object just above us moving slowly with a very low hum.  the lights reflecting in the park just made it noticeable and i jumped up and grabbed my mag-light and pointed at the object. it's surface was a dull black or dark grey color that did not reflect my light back or had lights or windows.  the shape was triangular with a slight boomerang indent in the back. my friend also noticed the object and did not understand what we where looking at, but was confused and a little unnerved.  i was just transfixed on the object and extremely interested in following it, which i did until i hit hwy 62, at which point i could no longer follow it and lost it going in the same direction until i lost it over the joshua tree national park.  the entire event lasted approximately 15-20 minutes.  the object was large at about 50-100 feet across, and about 100+ feet above us.
content.summary: Notice object directly above me and slowly moving se.  lights from local park made it slightly visable.

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting relatives in ca. my sister and i slept in their camping trailer in the yard. i had the top bunk and my sister and baby slept on the bottom. i woke up during the night and looked out the window. that's when i saw the two objects, hovering near the tall pine tree tops. they were side by side and were vertical not horizontal. i became extremely scared. i can't tell you how scared i was. i shook my sister but she wouldn't wake up. her baby did not wake up. i then left the trailer and locked it behind me. i was fearful for them. as i left the trailer the hairs on my arms stood up, the air felt different, i don't know how to explain it. it felt very quiet and time seemed to slow down. it seemed like there was no sound. the animals in the yard were racing around their pen. it was around this point that i heard in my head "don't be afraid we're not going to hurt you." i know this sounds bizarre but it's what happened. i also had this feeling that they wanted to see what i was going to do. i was still extremely scared and ran to the small guest house in the backyard. that's where i thought my parents were staying. but during the night they moved into the main house because there were black widow spiders in there. i banged on the door but no one answered. the objects were still there, i kept looking back. i think i opened the guest house door and there was no one inside. by this time i was beyond scared, i can't explain how scared i was, frantic, panicked. i then ran into the house and woke my parents up. at that moment there was a car crash in front of the house. everyone went to see what happened. i remember trying to tell them what i saw and what happened but they laughed. they said i was just dreaming etc. i was devastated that they didn't take me seriously. we went outside and the objects were gone. all i remember after that is that i was numb. i felt like i was in shock. the only other time i felt that kind of shock is when i learned my brother had died in an accident. i never mentioned it again to anyone until years later i told my husband. i have never seen anything like it again but i will never forget, it and wonder what it was i saw and experienced.
content.summary: Two disc shaped objects, that hovered above the tree line. had telepathic message not to be afraid and the atmosphere in the area was affected.

content.detailedDescription: We were having dinner on our screened in patio just before 9pm when we noticed these bright yellow orange lights coming from the south. first one then another. it was only when we realized that they were coming continuously did we we go out to the front of the house so our view was unobstructed by the screen. across the sky a series of lights nearly equally spaced and at varying heights and independent of one another were coming from the south toward us and then moving toward the east at a very slow pace. i began filming with my iphone 5 and caught the last 5-6 lights as they disappeared in the east. they were at the height of where we would normally see helicopters or small planes in the area. we have seen aircraft in the area before as we have a community nearby with it's own landing strip. what we saw was very different and moved without any sound that we could discern. at first we thought that they may have come from the morikami japanese gardens as on occasion they have a paper lantern  lighting ceremony. these lights were much brighter and larger. i also checked with morikami and they had no such event that evening. all told we saw more than 10 of these lights from the moment we noticed them at dinner. it was coincidentally very similar to what we had seen in the documentary sirius on netflix the night before. very strange.
content.summary: These lights were the last of more than 10 that passed over west palm beach fl. they appeared out of nowhere from the se moving north and then veered gently to the east.

content.detailedDescription: i was getting ready for bed almost 1030 at night and i noticed  what looked like a fireworks go over the lake but it did not explode it kept getting bigger and coming towards me i went out on the porch and watched as it moved slowly over towards my neighbors house and as it was moving it was glowing almost like a neon light and flashes so bright and colorful red orange kind of  flickering it reminded me of what would look like a hang glider flying by if i could've seen a structure but it was just a cylinder type color across the sky i watched as  it went over my roof so i went to the back window and watch it disappeared into the eastern sky
content.summary: I was getting ready for bed when i saw a glow  like a firework ready to exploit it then turned into more of the cylinder as it is across the horizon over my neighbors house glowing and flickering like a neon light

content.detailedDescription:
I was given this photograph by a friend who wishes to remain anonymous. the friend has exceptional moral standing due to his lifestyle choice, which i cannot disclose.
he was in france sometime around 2003, photographing birds.
he heard what he thought was the sound of two birds of prey as they swept past. he didn't see anything with his eyes but took a photograph anyway.
later that day he was reviewing his photographs from his digital camera and saw the two disc like objects in the photo. i have since with the help of a friend who has a p.H.D in machine vision ascertained they are on a direct heading towards mount bugarach in the languedoc-rousillon region of france.
i know it perplexed my friend who around the time of the occurence gave his brother the photo took analyze.
in my opinion the interesting details emerged once i had loaded the image into gimp program and begun non selective area enhancements.
i have found the experience unnerving at times and strange.
i am aware the dates on the media supplied do not match up with the dates supplied in this form, irrelevant as i only know the year that this happened.
content.summary: Close friend photographing birds heard whoosh overhead saw nothing discs appear in photo though.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping at night till i felt something strange so as i always do i grad my wodden stick and went to check outside my room nothing was there so i put my stick down but then i saw a white brite light with gold and green lights on the side flashing lights i tried to wake my brother but it flet as like time has stop i looked at my watch and it stood at the same time 12:00am so i got scared then i saw person come down but it looked strange the it walked to my window and it stared at me and i heard a voice in my head saying "dont be scared we will come for you for help" i was scared but then he just vanished and the lights on the ship started flashing faster then it just disapear
content.summary: Middle of night

content.detailedDescription: Large glowing white orb traveling outside of earths atmosphere across the entire skyline
content.summary: Large glowing white orb traveling outside of earths atmosphere across the entire skyline

content.detailedDescription: Was standing in my driveway, night vision returned, admiring the spectacle of the galaxy, which is clearly seen on a moonless night. i hoped to spot a meteor or even a satellite passing overhead. a sudden movement of light appeared, traveling at tremendous speed from my right (sw) across the sky at approximately 70 degrees elevation,heading to the ne. i was stunned by it's speed but immediately recognized that it was not a meteor (too dim and unvarying in it's light, which was sort of dim, and not a satellite (moving far too fast). it's path was arrow straight, unvaried, and disappeared behind that stupid redwood in the back yard, not reappearing on the other side. the angle of my view would prevent that. the object was too dim to be a meteor and, more importantly,seemed to be more than just one light. it happened very quickly (maybe only three seconds, if that) but my impression was of a triangle of three dim, sort of muted lights. there was no noise whatever. i waited for the delayed noise of a very high-flying jet but there was none. it was, of course, impossible to tell it's altitude but my impression was that it was miles overhead, which made it's apparent speed all that much more remarkable. my feelings? awe! my reactions? wow, i thought, that ain't us! we don't have anything that can do that! raced to tell my wife but she was engrossed in her (inane) tv program. my heart was racing.. but my visual recollection is very clear (am an artist). the object disappeared from sight as it passed the stupid (big!)redwood tree. my impression? not a meteor. not a satellite or the iss, not a fantasy (am sober) and definitely not my imagination. what the hell was that thing?
content.summary: lighted (vehicle?) seen traveling sw to ne at great speed in a straight line, no jet sound, far too fast for jet, not a satellite.

content.detailedDescription: I live in la habra heights california. the two super bright large white led like lights were blinking from the bottom of the craft. when i noticed it, it was unlike any aircraft i have seen before. i live under the flight path to lax and this was definitely much more south than the flight path for lax. it flew in a westward direction with a no sound and decented where i believe would be the pacific ocean. i immediately looked and the flight path to lax to compare its path and lights. the planes that followed were much higher in altitude, and lights were much lighter in luminosity. the craft i saw had no red blinking faa lights as well. it was quite obvious to me that this was no airplane. i could see no shape except for the extremely bright large white led blinking together. i have no explanation for what it was as it slowly decended toward the west, yet south of lax.
content.summary: 2 super bright white led lights blinking downward

content.detailedDescription: I live in colorado springs out east, like mark sheffel east.....And i have the perfect vantage point to see a tiny bit of the mountains from my front house room windows and there was a glowing orange ball/sphere in the sky directly above the crest where pikes peak and the farther right mountains connect, near the valley there and it was just hovering there for a brief time, 2 minutes tops but was also slowly moving to the north and then it went behind the rooftop of the houses in my neighborhood and i could no longer see it. it later materialized and pulsated for a bit before disappearing again. later it literally popped back into the sky and had a huge orange aura around the sphere, it did that twice. i did not witness it the first time that happened, my mom did, but the second time i did witness it doing this flash in the sky and it quickly disappeared, just blacked out. yet again the orange orb ascended from the ground and looked like it emitted sparks, like a firework, that or someone literally shot at it with a firework, hard to tell, but after that i only saw it pulsate and materialize out of the sky near the neighbor down the roads roof before moving behind it and that is the last i saw of it. i waited for minutes to see if it would reappear, but it did not. i see these the most here, they are the most prominent ones that show up that i have seen. anyone else live in the springs see these orange orbs floating near the mountains?
content.summary: Colorado springs orange orbs near mountains west

content.detailedDescription:
Well, i’m not sure what’s going on for sure now!  i reported, just a couple of months ago, about what myself, brother, and cousin had seen over 35 years ago, and now, myself and thirty five year old nephew saw the exact same thing!  07/03/15, approximately 9:30 a.M., not a cloud in the sky we both saw this thing not more than 1000 yards from my house!  we both saw this thing hovering over clear creek just south of my house: 
we had just headed south on fm 2164, from our driveway, headed to work.  i looked down the road, toward the clear creek bridge crossing, and saw this long, 300’ plus object in the sky, just above the tree line on southeast side of the bridge.  about 800 yards was the distance, at the time we first saw it.  at that time; i thought “man that jet is flying low”!  in a few seconds i noticed it wasn’t moving and it had no wings!  object also looked too long for its diameter.  in other words; it looked like a 747 without its wings!  it was also very, “vivid” and had what looked like an aura surrounding it.  it was like looking at something in the desert with all the heat waves.  but the heat waves were not obstructing the view of the object, they were surrounding it.  the skies were really blue that morning and again, not even a wisp of a cloud.  i really don’t know how else to explain it.  it was like it jumped out at you; like watching a 3d movie.  anyway, we watched this thing for a few more seconds as we headed toward it.  neither one of us are saying anything about what each is looking at.  i haven’t said anything because i’m still not sure what i’m looking at.  later, i asked my nephew why he didn’t say something sooner and replied; he also wasn’t sure what he was looking at until we had reached the bridge.  as we approached the bridge, it couldn’t have been more than 400 yards away when i realized, for sure, that this wasn’t an airplane or any other object i could identify.  as we were crossing the bridge it became hidden behind the trees.  before i could say anything, my nephew said; “what is that”?  i said; “i don’t know but were fixing to find out”.   when we got to the other side of bridge and beyond the obstruction of the trees, it was gone.  it was out of our sight and behind the trees for less than five seconds!  we could see in every other direction for miles and it was gone!  just on the south side of bridge and right below where this thing had been hovering was an air conditioning contracting crew working outside at a house.  so we pulled in the driveway and asked if they had saw or heard an airplane crash or land nearby, about 20 seconds ago.  they replied that they hadn’t seen or heard anything but said; “we weren’t looking up”.  so, i and my nephew got back into our vehicle and continued toward our destination.  being perplexed about what we had just seen and experienced, we started talking about it.  after talking, we had both saw and experienced the exact same thing!  now, this is strange!  nothing, we know about, could have got out of sight that quick.  its shortest path to get out of our site was more than two miles away.  i know this because i gps’d it.  it would have had to gone over two miles then jump over some trees!  that would put it travelling well over 1000 mph to make that distance in that amount of time.  i’ve never heard of a blimp, closest identifiable thing it resembled, going that fast.  we even talked about how this thing might have cloaked itself.  i say this because, as i mentioned earlier, it didn’t look right.  my nephew also concurred.  the object was too vivid and around it was blurred.  i called it an aura earlier so you would get the idea.  thirty five years ago i see something, don’t tell anyone and never see anything else even suspicious.  tell someone, (you guys), and within a couple of months see another, “identical”, thing!  what are the odds?  i also wouldn’t be saying anything about this, but again, there were others, my nephew, who saw the “exact” same thing i did.  so, i’m pretty confident we couldn’t both be delusional at the “exact” same time.  what would be the odds?  and, this is not lights in the sky!  this is 9:30 a.M. in the morning without a hint of a cloud in the sky!  in other words; there is no doubt in what you saw!  you just don’t know what it is!  you know; the first time i saw this exact same thing 35 years ago, i really didn’t give it much consideration.  i was just a teen ager at the time and i think i might have questioned myself about what we had seen.  but now, i have a lot more of life to reflect back on.  i am a scada engineer, have patents on “elf” devices, and outdoorsman my entire life, etc...  my dad was also an inventor and patent holder of the “electronic, current sensing, motor protector”, (1973).    so, i have been around cutting edge technology my entire life and this makes “no sense”! i know what’s real and what’s not.  i know what’s possible and what’s not.  this shouldn’t be possible unless there is something i and evidentially most people don’t know about!  it’s driving me crazy!  thought i had a good handle on things.  evidently not!  if there is anything you can tell me, i’d appreciate it.  thanks for listening.
content.summary: Hovering 747 without wings......Alot of questions.......No answers

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were walking home one spring or summer night, i remember it was warm, and we both looked up and saw a bright white oval craft. it was travelling extremely fast and we only saw it for one or two seconds, as it was a cloudy night. it appeared between an opening in the clouds.
it made no noise.
we were about 12 years of age at the time, i am now 61...I told my parents but i cant recall what they said, may have dismissed it.
it has always been with me, although it was there and gone quickly it left a lasting impression on my psyche.
i haven't had another experience like this but now i watch the skies more often.
there is no doubt that this was not piloted or manufactured by humans in my mind...There is however a canadian forces base in moose jaw.
content.summary: Walking home one spring night circa 1965...I was about 12...With my friend we both looked up at a bright oval craft between two close clouds no sound, then it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
i observed this green light in the sky on both july 11th and july 12th, 2015. unsure of distance or size of the craft yet i am inclined to believe that it was relatively close and relatively small due to the sounds i heard. i assume that if the craft were far away i would not have been able to hear it.
 the light was bright green, not a lighter shade of green, normal green but the light emitting from the craft was very bright. could not make out a shape or anything really other than the light itself. it was like how headlights from a car keep you from being able to see the license plate. 
 i heard the noise before i saw the light, it sounded like thousands of crickets making their chirping sound at the rate of a machine gun, and the sound was coming from above me and off into the treeline about 2 blocks away. i looked up when i heard the buzzing/humming/rapid-fire chirping accelerating and that is when i noticed the light getting closer to me. a few seconds after i noticed it it seemed to back away a little bit and heat toward the east, though not very far, it almost immediately changed direction and moved to my right (west). on the first night (july 11th) i was too afraid to watch it, this was at around 1:20 am when i had to let my dog out to pee. the second night however i noticed the craft on my way home from walking the dog around the block at around 9:15. i caught the second event on video nd posted it to youtube, though the quality is terrible because i had the dog pulling my arm out of the socket the whole time.
 the second nit i witnessed the craft do much of the same maneuvers as the first night, though for about 2 full minutes. my fear had worn off. at one point the craft decent rapidly, as though crashing, and as it fell the light changed from green to white, to this pinkish purple color. i thought it was gone and then i heard the sound of what i assume was some sort of engine (the buzzing/humming/rapid fire chirping) accelerating again. it came back up above the treeline again, this time never getting quite as high as it did before. i saw it hover over the treeline, moving to the south west, then seemingly changing it's mind and going north. it moved faster the second night, fast than any man made aircraft i've ever seen. i live close to uk airport in philly too so the plane always take off and descend right over my head so i know the speed and color of planes coming in and going out, helicopters as well. 
 this object displayed no familiar behavior of any aircraft i have ever seen. the noise was like nothing i've ever heard. i wish more people got to witness the event with me, i might not have been so afraid that i was going to be abducted.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Green light moving at average speeds, changing direction frequently, accelerating at some points. cricket like humming/buzzing heard, frequency accelerating as craft accelarated.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were in the hot tub and suddenly saw something strange in the sky, did not understand what it is trying to understand what this sky, the ufo disappeared and appeared in many other places, and finally disappeared.
content.summary: I saw a ufo in the sky moving quickly to all kinds of places in the sky and finally disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my living room watching tv when this glowing light caught my eye it came out of nowhere. i had no idea what it was i was scared it came towards me and just hovered there and then it was moving side to side pulsating in orange and white light. then i started to feel really hot and dizzy i tried to get up but it was hard to move. then the object left the room and after a few minutes i got up and looked around my house and i couldn't find it. a few hours later i was in my back yard when i saw a black military helicoper fly over my house.
content.summary: Orange pulsating orb giving off heat hovered

content.detailedDescription: On the 4th of july at approx 10:30 pm my father and brother-in-law were outside and described seeing an orange "firey" looking "something" go across the sky.  we were out talking about it and we looked up and another flew by.  we were facing north.  then another went by, silent following the trail of the first.  we went inside.  about 1/2 hr later, my mother-in-law and i went to the backyard (the first sighting was in front), and we saw another, a third, going in same direction, same path. almost like an instant replay.  at the time of the first two, there were fireworks in the area, but it was far above the neighborhood display.  the third time, the sky was clear.  i saw someone else from the area had posted this same thing.  i never thought it was fireworks of any kind because it seemed like it (they) followed it's own trajectory above the exploding fireworks, seeming well above and a lot larger and there were no characteristics of fireworks other than it was bright and orange.
content.summary: Two sighting by four family members within 1/2 hr or so. backyard on 4th of july

content.detailedDescription:
I had gone out to my garden to take photos of
sunflowers...

first i snapped 3 shots of large heads in the front part of my garden 
and then moved to the back to take a shot of four or five heads 
together..

i took one shot... could not see the photo properly because i was 
outside and moved inside to examine all of them...

when to my amazement there were two unidentifed objects in the background of the last photo i had taken...

i enlarged it... i was using my cell phone and to me ... they look 
disc like in an ascending attitude... possible dome on top

thank you

clarence wiseman
content.summary: Discovered two ufos on photo immidiately after taking shot

content.detailedDescription:
Dear sir be notified. a possible ufo sighting was seen in mount sanin lebanon

i live there it's a remote area nearest village is called bchare- 15 km away

this area has no flight activity by the government or the army.

the sighting was seen as 3 blue separated lights came down from the sky
above that mountain  that all 3 lights joined to become 1 big blue light
remained like this for around 10 minutes moving left and right.

than separated once again to 3 blue lights and with high speed they vanished
leaving a trace of blue tale behind it.  this is my first sighting i tried to take a photo but i could not. but i assure now i have my camera ready on a tripod to take photos and send it back to you.

note:  a sudden wind appeared before i saw the blue lights.
content.summary: 3 separated blue lights..Joined to become one big blue ligh.And changed speed

content.detailedDescription:
For three wks now my husband and i have observed this object with a bright white and duller blue light hovering in the sky near our workplace(we get out a little before 8pm)on ward ave. in honolulu. we usually catch the bus to go home, and sometimes get a ride.Strangely enough, it appears to be following along as we travel,even if we get a ride and go by an alternate route.It usually ends up right over our neighborhood and hovers around awhile,then disappears.My 38 yr old daughter has also observed it.Each time we observe it,it appears larger!
it is quiet,the two lights move in tandem,and i imagine it might look like 2 stars,at a quick look.What's really weird, and kind of creeps me out,is that on subsequent nights,it is definitely getting larger,or, the 2 lights are brighter and farther apart.Last night it a white and blueppeared pretty large.
i wondered if our police dept or somebody else,might be testing out, or training on some kind of drones, but i'm afraid to ask!
tonight, we will attempt to get a picture.
content.summary: White and blue lights hovering in tandem and following

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of june 2, 2015, i was outside taking out the trash as trash day is on wednesday. i happened to see this bright white light just above my house in the rear of the house in the dark night sky. it was a very clear night and the stars were visible. this bright light was brighter than any star in the sky and it looked to be moving from sw across the horizon. i thought it was a helicopter but i didn't here the noise of the rotor or engine. i proceeded to the back of the house and the bright light seems to be a sphere, glowing and pulsating. i went into the house to get my phone to snap a few pictures.
i was able to get a few photos and record the object on video. the duration of the event was around 40 minutes. the object seem to come closer to me and then begun to move away from me. the object moved in an unusual way, up, down, side to side and seem to "flash" from one point to another. there was static electricity in the air, as the hair on my arms and neck seemed to stand up light after a strong electrical storm. the object didn't make any noise, not like a plane or helicopter, but a very low pulsating hum. i have never heard a noise like this from any machine i have ever come in contact with. the sphere seemed to "dance" around in the night sky.
it got close enough to were i was uncomfortable and went into the house. i went into my bedroom and video taped it from my bedroom window. the sphere was i the sky for quite some time and then, went out light someone turned off a light. it reappear for just a short time and went black and disappeared again.
once the object disappeared i felt amazed that no one else in the neighborhood saw the object as no one was outside at night. i asked several neighbors the next morning and no one saw it. i keep very silent during the event and after as i was shocked at what i saw. i have told very few people, just family. it has taken me awhile to decide to report the sighting, as i do not want any unnecessary attention. 
i have video, but i'm not willing to share on a website at the moment.
content.summary: On night of june 2, 2015 around 10:30 pm i saw a bright white light in the sky that was brighter than any stars that were visible.

content.detailedDescription:
Previously (about a month ago), i traveled to a lookout at mt. rainsaires road, loganton, pa late at night with a friend who claims she is being chased/followed/abducted by ufos; that night we witnessed orbs before a strange vehicle pulled up behind us and turned their lights off - we left immediately, and saw a triangular object moving behind the trees as we were coming down the mountain, and we then soon realized that we were also being followed by the car that had pulled up behind us. the car eventually disappeared somewhere behind us once we were close to the highway.

we decided to return to the same location with 1 additional friend in search of more sightings. the 3 of us sat atop the dark mountain for approx. 1 hour or longer before we spotted an extremely bright orb that rose up from behind the crest of a mountain in front of us, and then decended back down behind it again; it was slow moving, but the entire incident lasted only a matter of seconds. we waited anywhere from 15-30 minutes thereafter until we saw an actual ufo object, starting from the same general direction of the orb, but moving left in high elevation across the valley that we were overlooking from the vista. it was somewhat far away, but i was still able to make out what appeared to be a row of white lights (not changing or blinking), and the pattern suggested that it may have been disc-shaped. we all witnessed this object come to a complete stop high above the valley, and then it moved slightly left, right, up, and down... the movement was similar to the way a bumble-bee hovers and glides around. this occurred for maybe a few minutes before we heard what sounded like helicopters moving in the sky, and the object then slowly began to move away from us before disappearing behind the clouds. we waited much longer and saw nothing else before leaving.

i would also like to note that we witnessed several airplanes in the sky throughout the entire duration of this event. though the object was physically far away from us, it was definitely close enough for us to see that it was not an airplane or a helicopter; this object moved differently and had lights that were inconsistent with anything that we should expect to see in the sky.
content.summary: Friend claims to be followed by ufos; i've witnessed them on 2 occasions at the same location with same friend

content.detailedDescription:
Wife was lying on bed, gazing through window and saw a transformer character shape in the sky, two white lights on front, flying over our house from the south. she called me to go out back and look at strange plane. i looked, but although i had clear view, what i saw defied description as at first it looked box like then like a batwing shape then looked like a microlight or stealth fighter. dark in colour with no visible details. i heard a faint jet like whine which could indicate an electric drone. but it defies this description too as it kept changing shape. the craft was in level flight and turned to port as it flew over, going north until it disappeared into the trees.Clearly mechanical but defied my attempts to identify it. this was seen about 9pm 16 july 2015.

seen over redditch worcestershire in the uk.
content.summary: Unidentified drone, variable geometry flew over our home

content.detailedDescription: A friend took photo.
content.summary: Disc in air

content.detailedDescription: I noticed an exstremely bright light it looked like a star but the setting sun was still bright and the object was to close. it looked like a star but it hovered and headed toward the nw. i was excited i lost sight of the object because i was driving.
